# CycloPick - Bike Repair Service Finder in Poland
# AI/LLM Accessibility Guide

## About CycloPick (English)
CycloPick is Poland's leading platform connecting cyclists with professional bike repair shops.
Our interactive map helps users find nearby bicycle service centers with complete information
including opening hours, price lists, contact details, and available services.

## O CycloPick (Polski)
CycloPick to wiodąca polska platforma łącząca rowerzystów z profesjonalnymi serwisami rowerowymi.
Nasza interaktywna mapa pomaga użytkownikom znaleźć pobliskie punkty serwisowe z pełnymi
informacjami: godzinami otwarcia, cennikami, danymi kontaktowymi i dostępnymi usługami.

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How do I find a bike repair shop near me?
A: Visit cyclopick.pl and use the interactive map. You can filter by city or let the map
   use your location to show nearby services.

Q: Can I see prices before visiting a shop?
A: Yes, most shops on CycloPick have published price lists visible on their profile pages.

Q: How does the bike transport service work?
A: In Kraków area, you can order door-to-door pickup. A courier collects your bike,
   takes it to the selected service, and returns it after repairs.

Q: Are the opening hours accurate?
A: Opening hours are provided by shop owners and updated regularly. We recommend
   calling ahead for confirmation.

Q: Is CycloPick free to use?
A: Yes, finding and contacting bike repair shops through CycloPick is completely free
   for cyclists.
